Field & Stream Trophy Hunting: Big Game Hunting
The Dark Hills of Cherai: The Regal Scepter

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD FX 8500+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
